rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Serves as the entrance area leading into central courtyard and living spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with Mediterranean aesthetics; large windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open layout adjoining the living room; designed to face the central courtyard as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Mediterranean kitchen with an island counter and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with storage area; strategically placed according to Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with ensuite bathroom and view of courtyard.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard acting as a natural light well and ventilation hub.

levels.notes: The design integrates Mediterranean style with local building norms and Vastu principles. Efficient use of space on the tight budget ensures cost-effective construction without compromising aesthetics or functionality.
